attributes.action: More information should be provided regarding Anencephaly
attributes.additional_details:
I lost my baby due to Anencephaly. This condition i had never heard of before i found out my baby had it. I feel that hospitals, especially midwives, should provide more information about this topic in departments. This will make people more aware of the illness, the risks and how to prevent it from happening to those planning a pregnancy.
There is very little information online, UK wise, about the illness

rejection.details: Please see - Recognition of Babies with Anencephaly Before 24 Weeks
